headline: KIOXIA SSDs Achieve Compatibility with Microchip’s Adaptec® SmartRAID 4300 Series RAID Storage Accelerator
summary: TOKYO, December 18, 2025--Kioxia Corporation announced that its SSDs have been tested for compatibility and interoperability with the Microchip RAID storage accelerator card.
